name: Hordela frustum
description:
Introduction

Hordela frustum is walking simulator where you need to use your active vision to progress. Beware in this mysterious place. Your visions have consequences

Controls

ZQSD to move around
Note : you can change these controls in options

Left mouse click to interact

Credits

Made by William Layec

Additionnal Sound : Melen Erzed

Additionnal Sound : Tom Bernet

Contact

E-mail : Hordelafrustum@gmail.com
